{"id":1278752001,"question_id":7,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â year, 1Â month","timestamp":1717611603,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1278752001/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        int reversed = 0;\n        while (x != 0) {\n            int pop = x % 10;\n            x /= 10;\n\n            // Check for overflow before updating reversed\n            if (reversed > INT_MAX/10 || (reversed == INT_MAX / 10 && pop > 7)) return 0;\n            if (reversed < INT_MIN/10 || (reversed == INT_MIN / 10 && pop < -8)) return 0;\n\n            reversed = reversed * 10 + pop;\n        }\n        return reversed;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":39}
